name: Bunny Rush
description:
Get to the top of the world to find the legendary carrot trove! But be careful: like this jam, the world itself is ending soon. So you, as a bunny, must naturally jump up up towards salvation and plenty food (and fe/male partners, don't forget about that!!).

How the hell is rotation a theme on this? Well I mean the bunny spins (rotates) when it lunges ??? Oh also minor themes like the cyclic nature of the universe and the futility of even trying!

IMPORTANT - Controls:

A - D : Movement

W : Jump

Left Shift : Lunge Forward (while on air)

Please consider this a rough prototype of this jumpy idea.
